tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 After my concerns you then informed me your going to increas the permit for waste, your smell tests let us down and I would like them stopped with a reassessment of new technology to protect people in the future!

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 When I contacted you last year with my concerns that I could smell LFG in my home and garden your reply was basically put up with it, now we are thousands united and it's a risk to health with toxins and carcinogens will you tell us what went wrong?

Simple question @EnvAgencyMids. Why are you not monitoring air quality inside our homes? Our exposure times to the #walleysquarry gases are far longer than anything your MMF is picking up, due to the gases getting trapped in our homes whilst we sleep. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/PrywMHIhJg
@AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency When the level for poor air is 201 but it's reading 749!!! https://t.co/JGKJQiT6Kz

Almost 500(!) people joined our webinar last month on the #flood #hydrology roadmap for the UK w/ Sean Longfield @EnvAgency Rob Lamb @JBATrust Nick Reynard @UK_CEH & @hancloke @UniofReading

If you missed it, you can catch up now on our YouTube channelüì∫ https://t.co/C12FtzGMBn

Now this is the story all about how
My life filled with stink, turned upside down
And I'd like to take a minute, just sit right there
I'll tell you how we long for a town with clean air! #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk #shameonREDINDUSTRIES #REDINDUSTRIES #landfill

@HMUG_Hackney @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @theriverstrust We've set up a bathing water knowledge hub on slack to share experience between groups looking to apply for Bw designation or monitor water quality: https://t.co/p4C4cQHSHt
